videoShowcase.homeTitle: Move Forward to the Technological Future
videoShowcase.homeSubTitle: Empower your business with the best and most innovative tech solutions
videoShowcase.htmlVideoFallback: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.

services.title: Customized Solutions
services.description: Creating software tailored to your needs, digitizing your processes to transform your business, including task automation, and more.

services.title: Integration with New Technologies
services.description: Implementation and adaptation of emerging technologies to modernize your existing systems, as well as cloud migration for scalability and operational efficiency.

companyDescSection.title: More than a solution, a partner
companyDescSection.description: The success of your business is our top priority, which is why we want to be your strategic partner, adapting to your specific needs. We work closely with you to understand your unique challenges and provide the support needed to overcome them. Together, we achieve your goals by empowering your growth and optimizing your processes.

usDescSection.title: About Us
usDescSection.description1: On StWar Studios, we specialize in custom software development based on your needs, including websites, integrations, automation, and more, leveraging new technologies to deliver innovative solutions.
usDescSection.description2: Our commitment to high human value means we put both you and our collaborators first, fostering the growth and professional development of every team member.
usDescSection.description3: With a clear vision for the future, we aim to expand in Latin America and become a reference in the technology sector. We distinguish ourselves by our responsibility, integrity, and commitment to quality, ensuring your satisfaction and trust in all our services.
usDescSection.closingStatement: We are here to accompany you and grow together!

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We are responsible and ethical in our actions, services, and products.

values.title: Passion
values.description: We put our heart into every task. We are excited by coding, design, and planning.

values.title: Discipline
values.description: We are constant, punctual, focused, and organized in our activities.

values.title: Commitment
values.description: We give our all, voluntarily and passionately.
